text: AmBank Tower is the 41st tallest skyscraper in Malaysia. It is located on Jalan Yap Kwan Seng, just 0.05 km from Kuala Lumpur City Centre. The tower was officially opened by Malaysian Prime Minister, Mahathir Mohamad, in 2003. It has a 17-meter (56-foot) antenna on top and is the headquarters of AmBank Group. ==References== Category:Skyscrapers in Malaysia Category:Buildings and structures in Kuala Lumpur
title: AmBank Tower
